original_text: While David was sitting between the inner and outer gates, the watchman went up to the roof of the gateway by the wall. As he looked out, he saw a man running alone.
korean_text: 때에 다윗이 두 문 사이에 앉아 있더라 파수꾼이 성 문 위층에 올라가서 눈을 들어 보니 어떤 사람이 홀로 달려오는지라

sentences.original_text: While David was sitting between the inner and outer gates
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗이 안문과 바깥문 사이에 앉아 있을 때

sentences.original_text: the watchman went up to the roof of the gateway
he saw a man running alone
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 혼자 달리는 한 사람을 보았습니다
